thread.title: BRIEF-DTE Energy Co Reports Quarterly Operating Earnings $1.26 Per Share

title: BRIEF-DTE Energy Co Reports Quarterly Operating Earnings $1.26 Per Share
text: February 16, 2018 / 12:30 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-DTE Energy Co Reports Quarterly Operating Earnings $1.26 Per Share Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - DTE Energy Co: * QTRLY NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO DTE ENERGY COMPANY $1.60 PER SHARE * DTE ENERGY RAISES 2018 OPERATING EPS GUIDANCE FROM $5.48 - $5.88 TO $5.57 - $5.99 * QTRLY OPERATING EARNINGS $1.26 PER SHARE * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.19 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.72 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES 2018 TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES BETWEEN $3,460 MILLION - $3,660 MILLION Source text : ( bit.ly/2sAngMr ) Further company coverage:
